// Repeats: 36-27, 96-27, 180-27, 181-27, 182-27, 182-33, 192-27, 327-27, 328-27, 329-27, 330-27, 331-27, 332-27, 373-27, 374-27, 375-27, 376-27, 377-27, 378-27, 379-27, 431-1
378-28:@We may be tiny, but we're still living beings.[BREAK]  We eke out our lives as mole crickets.[WAIT]@And actually, we've started to branch out into[BREAK]  the business world.[WAIT]@With franchises opening up everywhere, we're[BREAK]  now at the forefront of business evolution.[WAIT]@We have all sorts of wonderful goods that we[BREAK]  found lying on the... [PAUSE 0F 00]I mean, stocked up on.[WAIT]@I could let you have some of them, if you'd[BREAK]  like.[WAIT]@Well? Would you like to take a look?[WAIT][MENU 02 00][MENUSPACEYES]Yes[MENUSPACENO]No[ENDCHOICES][END]
378-28E:@Может мы и малы, но мы многое можем.[BREAK]  Мы, Медведки, просто живём свои жизни.[WAIT]@Недавно, мы решили отправиться в[BREAK]  мир бизнеса.[WAIT]@Так как всюду открываются франшизы,[BREAK]  мы теперь имеем свой бизнес бизнес.[WAIT]@У нас есть замечательные товары, которые[BREAK]  мы нашли на п... [PAUSE 0F 00]То есть, закупили.[WAIT]@Если хочешь, я могу поделиться ими с тобой.[WAIT]@Ну? Глянешь на товары?[WAIT][MENU 02 00][MENUSPACEYES]Да[MENUSPACENO]Нет[ENDCHOICES][END]
// Repeats: 36-28, 43-7, 96-28, 180-28, 181-28, 182-28, 192-28, 327-28, 328-28, 329-28, 330-28, 331-28, 332-28, 373-28, 374-28, 375-28, 376-28, 377-28, 378-28, 379-28
378-29:@Oh, I see.[WAIT]@Well, I'm sure we'll have a mutually-profitable[BREAK]  encounter someday![END]

// Repeats: 36-29, 43-8, 96-29, 180-29, 181-29, 182-29, 192-29, 327-29, 328-29, 329-29, 330-29, 331-29, 332-29, 373-29, 374-29, 375-29, 376-29, 377-29, 378-29, 379-29

378-31:@I may not look like it, but I'm not a starfish.[WAIT]@I used to be a shining star in the night sky.[WAIT]@Long, long ago, I fell into the ocean as a[BREAK]  shooting star.[WAIT]@Do you believe me?[WAIT][MENU 02 00][MENUSPACEYES]Yes[MENUSPACENO]No[BREAK][ENDCHOICES][END]

378-32:@Are you serious?[END]

467-27:@We may be tiny, but we're still living beings.[BREAK]  We eke out our lives as mole crickets.[WAIT]@Business for us is booming now![WAIT]@We mole crickets have found the trick to[BREAK]  commercial success![WAIT]@We sell all sorts of wonderful goods that we[BREAK]  find lying on the... 883-1:@Has anyone ever seen Master Porky before?[WAIT]@How old do you think he is?[WAIT]@He must be amazing to build a city like this.[END]

883-3:@Oh, [LUCAS 23 02 00].[WAIT]@I was just on my way to the DCMC concert.[WAIT]@I've actually never seen them before,[WAIT]  even though I worked at the factory right next[BREAK]  to Titiboo for such a long time.[WAIT]  Hahaha.[END]
